channel.title: Grand Theft Auto on Gamefacts
channel.description: Recent content in Grand Theft Auto on Gamefacts

item.title: Gamefact #2
item.description:
The very first Grand Theft Auto launched on MS-DOS and Windows on November 28, 1997. GTA IV released on April 29, 2008â€”a span of 10 years, 5 months, and 1 day.

Today marks 12 years since the release of GTA V (September 17, 2013). In that time, Rockstar has not released another mainline GTA title. Instead, we only saw one handheld spinoff (GTA: Chinatown Wars for PSP and Nintendo DS) and two expansions for GTA IV (The Lost and Damned and The Ballad of Gay Tony).
